extendedInfo.description: MyView helps to enjoying media that you want to play.You can play contents that you and your friend have.How to enjoy MyView?1. Get MyView HomeServer from MyView Website(http://www.imyview.com)2. Install MyView HomeServer.3. Once the server is running, Set-up share-folder that you want to play.4. Run MyView app5. Add you or friends MyView Server.6. Just Play!* Features- StreamingMyView can stream videos to your Android phone. You can playing videos on 3G or Wifi. Just to play them.- Conversion If the videos in your collection are not in format supported by Android, MyView can streams them on live conversions entire file.- DownloadIf the videos in your collection are not in format supported by Android, MyView can Download that coverted entire files.* Supported formatsVideo - MP4, AVI, WMV, TS, TP, MKV, MTS, MOV, M4V, SKM, FLV, K3G, MPEG, 3GP, Divx, Xcid, AVC, etc.Audio - MP3, WMA, Dolby Digital, etc.Air video* Supported devices- Android OS 2.1 or later supported- Test Equipment: GalaxyS, Take, HTC Desire- Optimizing Resolution: 480 * 800

reviews.title: Shows Promise on D1 but unreliable V10016
reviews.comment: Looking forward to this app maturing over the next few months, but not good now. New Feature Suggestions: - Add the ability to change the encoding resolution on the server. The current settings use too much bandwidth for 3G and sometimes make unplayable vids on WIFI. Add the ability do download files pre-encoded by other apps. Update the encoding engine to something faster like DVDFAB. The current process is too slow. Make the error messages display based on the language settings. List as ALPHA
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its ok, good alternative for Apple\'s Air Video. But this app needs improvement. Crashes a lot. Can\'t seem to find how to change screen orientation.
